features: 【𝗧𝗿𝗮𝘃𝗲𝗹 𝗘𝘀𝘀𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗮𝗹𝘀 & 𝗠𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗵𝗮𝘃𝗲】This portable and lightweight iron for clothes is perfect for travel, vacation and outing use. With this mini steamer, you can always go out with a tidy outfit. You can put it into your suitcases and backpacks without taking up too much space. ( only use in 110V area, If you have plans travelling to europe, also need a vlotage converter)

【𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿 & 𝗜𝗿𝗼𝗻 𝟮 𝗶𝗻 𝟭】This 2-in-1 steamer for clothes can be a normal iron or a steamer iron to meet different ironing needs. When you plug in the steamer without pressing the button, then you will get an iron. After pressing the button, you can use it as a steamer. It is highly recommended to use steamer mode which has a better effect than iron.

【𝟭𝟬𝟬𝟬𝘄 & 𝟱𝘀 𝗙𝗮𝘀𝘁 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴】With 1000W high power, the steamer can iron clothes with constant temperature of 302°F. It only takes 5 seconds to warm up and 3 minutes to iron a shirt, which will be easy and effortless for you to iron clothes, curtains, bed sheets and so on. This steamer is truly a home essential and college apartment essential.

【𝗣𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 & 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲】The mini garment steamer with a foldable handle is convenient to store. And it is capable of both flat ironing and hanging ironing. With only 1.37 pounds and 6 inches of the longest side, it is comfy to hold and use. You won't feel tired or sore while ironing clothes for a long time with this steamer.

【𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲 & 𝗦𝘂𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗔𝗹𝗹 𝗙𝗮𝗯𝗿𝗶𝗰𝘀】With the ceramic panel which is smooth and anti-scratch, this mini iron can effectively remove crease and wrinkle without damaging the fabric. And it is suitable and safe for all kinds of fabrics, such as organic fabrics, nylon blend, wool, cotton, linen and much more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SUITABLE FOR TRAVEL , HOME ,DORM & APATRMENT This steamer iron is perfect for travel, vacation and dorm . ( only use in 110V area, If you have plans travelling to europe, also need a vlotage converter)you can also use this steamer abroad simply with a converter.Only 1.4lb weight & 6in length.You can easily put it into your suitcases and backpacks without taking up too much space.

UPGRADED FUNCTIONS This steam iron has a mini design, yet it packs a lot of power and functionality. It's upgraded as a 2-in-1 steamer iron, Compared to normal irons, Our steamer iron can cope with almost all fabrics, and has a better ironing effect with steam. With 1000W high power, the steam and panel can reach 302°F and it only takes 5s to heat up. You don't need to wait any more.
GREAT DESIGN Mini & lightweightHandle that can be rotated 180 degrees100ml capacity water tankHigh power, Fast heatingCan switch to steamer mode3s to eject steamExcellent ABS material
2 IRONING WAYS It is capable of both flat ironing and hanging ironing. With steam , it has a better ironing effect and can iron almost all fabrics.
Garment Steamer Heat up quickly and have several jets to eject steam. it does good job in ironing your clothes. Powerful enough to remove wrinkles and stains from even the most stubborn clothes
NOTICE PLEASE This iron panel will be very hot, it will take more than 50 minutes to cool, you can put it on the tray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light and easy to handle
reviews.reviewText: The steamer is truly exceptional! Despite claiming to heat up in 20 sec, it actually takes about 5, which is a game-changer for someone like me with limited time in the morning. I appreciate the rotating handle, offering added convenience. Whether I'm steaming vertically or horizontally, it performs exceptionally well. The steamer's build is sturdy, and the most important, it doesn't spit water, leaving my clothes neither damp nor wet.Its lightweight and compact design make it perfect for travel. I've tried various small steamers, including expensive ones, and this one surpasses them all. I specifically sought a compact option to save space, and this steamer fulfills my need for quick steaming.The downside is that you can't visually check the water level, but it's not a big issue as you'll hear when it's out of water, and refilling doesn't waste time thanks to its quick heating. The steamer includes a robust pad for resting it while dealing with garments. Although I turn it off when placing it on the pad, it's a minor step since it heats up instantly when you press the button again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for travel
reviews.reviewText: Good, it is small so it is easy to move around when you travel! Fast and easy to use,it will iron clothes in a few seconds,just what I wanted!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenience without compromising performance
reviews.reviewText: This travel Steamer Iron is user-friendly. Despite its size, it performs comparably to standard-sized steamers, offering convenience without compromising performance. Plus its budget friendly, which makes it a practical choice for travelers or seeking an efficient yet affordable steaming solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the most effective!
reviews.reviewText: I used this a few times and I think it functions great. The only downside is that it doesn't completely diminish wrinkles unless you go over it several times. Other than that, it's a great value steamer iron for the price it's sold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's perfect, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: What I liked most is that it is small and therefore easy to use, it is not heavy. The steam is the best, it gives a perfect finish to the clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very misleading. Not good for international travel.
reviews.reviewText: This is misleading. I simple outlet plug convert will not work. You need a bulky power converter.Description says "When Using It In Other Countries Just With One Converter"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for traveling
reviews.reviewText: I bought this specifically to steam dresses, suits, and robes for my sister's destination wedding. Our boutique hotel did not have an iron on hand and we were steaming different family members' garments at various places. This is light weight so it's easy to travel with. It heats up quickly and releases a steady stream of steam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact Marvel for Wrinkle-Free Travels!
reviews.reviewText: Recently tried the Steamer Iron and it's been a game-changer for my trips. Fits right into my travel bag without taking much space. The best part? It's surprisingly good at getting rid of wrinkles quickly. Super easy to use, heats up fast, and it's not just for clothes – refreshed my curtains too. If you're after a hassle-free travel companion that keeps your outfits neat, this mini steamer is worth considering.
